query:
INSERT INTO recharges (customerId, amount, paymentMethod, status, transactionId, completedAt, createdAt, updatedAt) 
SELECT customerId, amount, 'pix', 'completed', txid, paidAt, paidAt, paidAt 
FROM pix_transactions 
WHERE amount = 555 AND status = 'paid' 
LIMIT 1

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 35dchGD4KrPJFby.root --database 2KeMNLvGvAyUJv9AEWkrsw --execute INSERT INTO recharges (customerId, amount, paymentMethod, status, transactionId, completedAt, createdAt, updatedAt) 
SELECT customerId, amount, 'pix', 'completed', txid, paidAt, paidAt, paidAt 
FROM pix_transactions 
WHERE amount = 555 AND status = 'paid' 
LIMIT 1
